SimsCafe.name: Gumbo
SimsCafe.description: slow and low cooked rue mixed with the holy trinity and my herb and spice blend. saute some chicken add it all to a seafood broth with okra, andouille sausage, shrimp, crawl fish, and crab pour that over a bowl of Jasmin rice and youre ready to go.
ingredients: 1 large green bell pepper coarsely chopped
2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce or to taste
½ teaspoon Cajun seasoning blend or to taste
2 (10 ounce) packages frozen cut okra thawed
3 pounds uncooked medium shrimp peeled and deveined

SimsCafe.name: Jambalaya
SimsCafe.description: we start this off with some hot olive oil sautéed holy trinity sausage and chicken breast we then add a tomato-based souse chicken broth and that Jasmin rice after cooking this to perfection all you need is a big bowl and lets go
ingredients: 1 large green bell pepper coarsely chopped
2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce or to taste
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning blend or to taste

SimsCafe.name: Bacon and Shrimp Sliders
SimsCafe.description: sautéed olive oil and garlic shrimp with my herb and spice blend crisp bacon add a fresh pico de gallo to a sweet Hawaiian roll and you have a mouth full of greatness
ingredients: 3 pounds uncooked large shrimp peeled and deveined
1 large green bell pepper coarsely chopped
1 pack 32 count King's Hawaiian Original Hawaiian Sweet Rolls
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning blend or to taste

SimsCafe.name: Shrimp Stuffed Salmon
SimsCafe.description: minced salmon with that holy trinity my herb and spice blend stuffed into a jumbo prawn and grilled to golden perfection
ingredients: 3 pounds uncooked jumbo prawns peeled and deveined
1 large green bell pepper coarsely chopped
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning blend or to taste

SimsCafe.name: Blackened Salmon with Rice & Peas
SimsCafe.description: we have a pan seared salmon with a spice blend standing next to a Jamaican rice and peas
ingredients: 1 teaspoon light or dark brown sugar

SimsCafe.name: Surf and Turf
SimsCafe.description: start with a grilled lobster tail then butter poached with my spice and herb blend add twice fried chicken wings to a plate of butter and garlic  sautéed noodles and you have a meal of my dreams
ingredients: 2 tbsp. freshly sliced chives, plus more for garnish
2 tbsp. freshly chopped parsley, plus more for garnish
1/4 tsp. kosher salt, plus more for seasoning
Pinch of crushed red pepper flakes
water, for boiling the noodles GARLIC SAUCE:
1 stick unsalted butter (4 oz. /110 g/1/2 cup/8 tablespoons)
2 tablespoons minced garlic or more to taste
